query:
SELECT 
  id,
  name,
  createdAt,
  DATEDIFF(NOW(), createdAt) as dias_desde_criacao,
  CASE 
    WHEN DATEDIFF(NOW(), createdAt) < 7 THEN 'NOVO ✨'
    ELSE 'ANTIGO'
  END as status_badge
FROM services 
WHERE name IN ('Whatsapp', 'Outros apps/Site') 
AND active = 1;
